Generation VI.X: Generations of kings were attended by these Pokémon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokémon.
Generation VI.Y: Apparently, it can detect the innate qualities of leadership. According to legend, whoever it recognizes is destined to become king.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Generations of kings were attended by these Pokémon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokémon.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Apparently, it can detect the innate qualities of leadership. According to legend, whoever it recognizes is destined to become king.

Generation VIII.Sword: This stance is dedicated to offense. It can cleave any opponent with the strength and weight of its steel blade.
Generation VIII.Shield: Once upon a time, a king with an Aegislash reigned over the land. His Pokémon eventually drained him of life, and his kingdom fell with him.
